name: install-terraform
description: Install Terraform at any version to a Github Action Job environment

scripts.version: npm run build && auto-changelog -p --template keepachangelog auto-changelog --breaking-pattern 'BREAKING CHANGE:' && git add CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && ncc build index.js -o dist -s
